content.question: Marshallâ€™s claim that his aid plan is not aimed at any country or doctrine is best explained in the context of

choices.label: concerns about the possible revival of Nazism in Germany
rising hostilities with the Soviet Union at the start of the Cold War
growing nationalist independence movements in Eastern Europe
early discussions to create a free-trade zone that would become the European Union

content.answer: rising hostilities with the Soviet Union at the start of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
